This Thursday, Pi Day, I will be addressing 500 WUSTL alumni at a dinner at San Francisco City Hall. As the featured student speaker for the evening, I will be discussing innovation and entrepreneurship at the university. If you are an alum in the Bay who would like to attend, please contact the university.

For those in attendance, here are links to the topics I will be discussing:

  • PackSay by Blake Marggraff

  • Sparo Labs

  • NoQ by Spencer Hewett

  • wute

  • wute.vc

  • Alexis Ohanian

  • Discovery Competition

  • Text Reject
